attributes.action: Vaccinate all teachers against COVID-19 before reopening schools
attributes.additional_details: Teachers are the most vulnerable of front line workers dealing with children particularly secondary schools
attributes.background: Legislate that a school must have vaccinated all its teachers against COVID-19 before it can reopen

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/554316

We can't accept petitions that appear to be calling for mandatory medical treatment, but we could accept a petition calling for schools not to be reopened unless certain conditions are met.
